fields.label: Why CDA Block
fields.name: why_cda_block
fields.instructions: Global Why CDA content that can be used across all pages

sub_fields.label: Subtitle
sub_fields.name: subtitle
sub_fields.default_value: What Makes Us The Right Choice?

fields.label: Approach Block
fields.name: approach_block
fields.instructions: Global Approach content that can be used across all pages - Our step-by-step approach

sub_fields.label: Approach Steps
sub_fields.name: steps
sub_fields.instructions: Add up to 5 steps for the approach process. Steps will be connected with arrows on desktop and mobile.

sub_fields.label: Step Number
sub_fields.name: step_number
sub_fields.instructions: Enter the step number (1-5) for ordering

sub_fields.label: Step Title
sub_fields.name: title
sub_fields.instructions: Enter the title for this step

sub_fields.label: Step Description
sub_fields.name: description
sub_fields.instructions: Brief description of what happens in this step
sub_fields.placeholder: Describe what happens in this step...

sub_fields.label: Step Image
sub_fields.name: image
sub_fields.instructions: Upload an image or icon for this step
